message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $9000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8000 for it. Would you be willing to accommodate this price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget. I can meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I'm willing to offer it to you for $8500. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny!
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort, but I am still unable to go above $8000 for the product. Could we possibly meet at $8000?
